title: Rohingya Refugees Sue Facebook for $150 Billion for Perpetuating Violence
sub_head: Lawsuit alleges social-media company had a role in ‘anti-Rohingya hate speech, misinformation, and incitement of violence’ in Myanmar
body:
Rohingya refugees sued Facebook parent Meta Platforms Inc., alleging the social-media platform perpetuated the genocide against the Muslim ethnic group in Myanmar.
The lawsuit, filed Monday in California, says Facebook’s launch in Myanmar a decade ago “materially contributed to the development and widespread dissemination of anti-Rohingya hate speech, misinformation, and incitement of violence—which together amounted to a substantial cause, and perpetuation of, the eventual Rohingya genocide.”
